markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hardy Traveler](/Feats.aspx?ID=1439) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 47 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

There's no journey too far or burden too heavy when your friends are at your side. Increase your maximum and encumbered Bulk limits by 1. In addition, you gain a +10-foot circumstance bonus to your Speed during overland travel.
name: Hardy Traveler
